executable.title: Compute Contrast Image Using Adaptive Histogram Equalization (TubeTK)
executable.description: Apply adaptive histogram equalization to an image
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware. It was funded in part by USC:EXPOSE.

parameters.label: Options
parameters.description: Initial values for parameters to be optimized.

float.name: alpha
float.label: Alpha
float.description: Controls how much the filter acts like the classical histogram equalization method (alpha=0) to how much the filter acts like an unsharp mask (alpha=1)..

float.name: beta
float.label: Beta
float.description: Controls how much the filter acts like an unsharp mask (beta=0) to much the filter acts like pass through (beta=1, with alpha=1).

integer.name: window
integer.label: Window
integer.description: Controls the size of the region over which local statistics are calculated.
